003
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import kut.*;
006
007/**
008  Log utility.<p>
009  Function 'setPath' must be called before any other function!!!.<p>
010  Log table is initialized with 'reset'.
011*/
012public class Log {
013
014  static String fileOp = null;
015
016  /**
017    Set file path of log.
018    @param fpath Log file path.
019  */
020  public static void setPath (String fpath) {
021    fileOp = fpath;
022  }
023
024  static String date () {
025    return Time.fmt(Time.now(), "%D/%M/%Y(%t)");
026  }
027
028  static void write (ArrayList<Tp3<Boolean, String, String>> l) {
029    File.write(fileOp, Js.w(
030      Arr.map(l, (tp) -> {
031        return Js.w(Arr.mk(Js.w(tp.e1), Js.w(tp.e2), Js.w(tp.e3)));
032      })
033    ));
034  }
035
036  static ArrayList<Tp3<Boolean, String, String>> read () {
037    return Arr.map(
038      Js.ra(File.read(fileOp)),
039      (j) -> {
040        ArrayList<String> a = Js.ra(j);
041        return new Tp3<>(Js.rb(a.get(0)), Js.rs(a.get(1)), Js.rs(a.get(2)));
042      }
043    );
044  }
045
046  /**
047  Returns the log serialized.
048  @return The log serialized.
049  */
050  public static String readJs () {
051    return File.read(fileOp);
052  }
053
054  /**
055  Adds a warning to log.
056  @param msg Message.
057  */
058  public static void warning (String msg) {
059    ArrayList<Tp3<Boolean, String, String>> l = read();
060    l.add(new Tp3<>(false, date(), Str.left(msg, 400)));
061    write(l);
062  }
063
064  /**
065  Adds an error to log.
066  @param msg Message.
067  */
068  public static void error (String msg) {
069    ArrayList<Tp3<Boolean, String, String>> l = read();
070    l.add(new Tp3<>(true, date(), Str.left(msg, 400)));
071    write(l);
072  }
073
074  /** Reset log. */
075  public static void reset () {
076    File.write(fileOp, "[]");
077  }
078}
